name: Knight Commander
text: Your path as a warlord has led you to assume the status of a knight commander, an armored epitome of leadership and combat who has no fear of leading from the frontâ€”and who has the requisite skills and abilities to handle that responsibility. You inspire by example, you press every offensive, and you rally your allies with powerful attacks and stirring tactics.

features.honorAndGlory(11thLevel): Allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls while adjacent to you
features.knightCommander'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, your allies gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn
features.pressOfArms(16thLevel): When you or an ally within 3 squares of you makes an opportunity attack, that attacker gains a bonus to the damage roll
